appendix.title: Credits
appendix.para: This section is dedicated to those people who contributed in some way to xmlwrapp. If I have forgotten you, please forgive me and drop me a note.

section.title: Maintainers
section.para: The following people currently maintain xmlwrapp.

listitem.para: Peter Jones - Author and main maintainer.

section.title: Contributers
section.para: The following people have made contributions to xmlwrapp.

section.title: Other Software
section.para: We would also like to thank the following software projects.

listitem.para: libxml2 - Thanks for the great XML parser library and the use of the MIT License and not the GPL.
GNU Compiler Collection - Thanks for the 3.X series of compilers. Good work!
